thread.title: Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography
thread.title_full: Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography

title: Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography
text: > North Carolina Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography FILE - In this Nov. 5, 2014 file photo, Scotty McCreery arrives at the 48th annual CMA Awards in Nashville, Tenn. McCreery, the young man who won “American Idol” with his impressive baritone voice, is releasing his first book. The singer, who turns 22 on Friday, announced that his book, “Go Big or Go Home: The Journey Toward the Dream,” will be released on May 3, 2016 through Zondervan. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP, File)
